column4: Does anyone in here use Twitter? Because I can't get it to work from Firefox on my Ubuntu laptop
I do. What's up?
I can use Gwibber to Tweet, which is fine, don't get me wrong, but sometimes I just want to use Firefox...
ever since the hack, Fx doesn't work when I try to Tweet.
Yes I know what you mean :) What problems specifically are you having with Firefox?
well, I'll type out the Tweet, click update... and nothing happens. It just sits there, acting like it's loading. I let it sit for over half an hour yesterday, and no Tweet.
I tried clearing the cache and even deleting all my cookies. Nothing. Plus, I know it's not a general Fx problem, b/c it works on Windows.
It is working fine for me as expected. Can you tell me the release of Ubuntu, whether it is 32-bit or 64-bit?
I'm running Intrepid (8.10), the 32-bit version
What version of Firefox?
That is very strange. Okay. What about the add-ons you have installed and any plugins? You can PM me.
guess what? The update didn't help
Awh :( Okay. Start firefox in safe mode (firefox --safe-mode) and tell me if it helps
doesn't help.
Wow now I have reason to believe it is a combination of your network speed and Twitter's programming that is causing the problem
well, it's DSL -- it's never been an issue before! And it's not an issue on Windows.
Before what?
as I had mentioned in my previous comments -- this all worked before Twitter got hacked.
seeing as it's unrelated to Ubuntu, I didn't mention -- I also cannot Tweet from my phone any longer, either.
http://twitter.com/eboyjr I dont know what else to think of. It is working for me
